original_text: When he was going into a village, ten men came towards him. These men had a bad disease of the skin. They stopped and stood a long way away from Jesus.
korean_text: 한 마을에 들어가시니 나병환자 열 명이 예수를 만나 멀리 서서

sentences.original_text: When he was going into a village
These men had a bad disease of the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 피부에 나쁜 병이 있었다

sentences.original_text: and stood a long way away from Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수님으로부터 멀리 떨어져 서 있었다
